manual_content.ingest_desc: Use the <b_0>Ingest</b_0> tab to onboard new assets. Structure residential, commercial, or land listings instantly via Gemini AI.
manual_content.concierge_desc: Navigate to the <b_0>Concierge</b_0> tab to find your unique website embed code. This places the AI chatbot on your agency site.
manual_content.rules_desc: The bot is programmed to answer two specific questions about any property. Upon the third, it will pivot to secure lead capture.

privacy_content.intro: EstateGuard utilizes <b_0>Zero-Trust</b_0> architecture. Your property data and lead transcripts are your agency's private assets.
privacy_content.sovereignty: <b_0>Model Sovereignty:</b_0> Your data is NOT used to train global models.

terms_content.text: Usage of the EstateGuard AI platform requires compliance with local property disclosure regulations and maintenance of a valid personal Gemini API Key.

legal_content.disclaimer: RealAi EstateGuard is an AI-driven facilitation tool. All outputs must be verified by a licensed professional.

pwa_content.ios_step3: 3. Scroll down and tap <b_0>'Add to Home Screen'</b_0>.
pwa_content.ios_step4: 4. Open the <b_0>EstateGuard</b_0> app icon from your home screen.
pwa_content.android_step1: 1. Tap the <b_0>'Menu'</b_0> icon (3 dots) top right.
pwa_content.android_step2: 2. Select <b_0>'Install App'</b_0> or <b_0>'Add to Home Screen'</b_0>.
pwa_content.android_step3: 3. Confirm the installation and find it in your drawer.
pwa_content.desktop_text: Click the <b_0>Install</b_0> icon in your address bar, OR open the <b_1>Browser Menu</b_1> and select <b_2>"Install App"</b_2>.

settings.knowledge_base_desc: Train your AI agent on your specific business details. Fill in as many as possible.

hints.intro: This text appears above the chatbot bubble on your website.
hints.api: Your dedicated API key powers your specific agent's intelligence. No data is shared across agencies.

manual.title: Agent Operating Manual
manual.subtitle: Master the EstateGuard platform. Learn to deploy AI, train your portfolio, and secure your pipeline.

search.title: Portfolio Search
search.desc: Use the search bar in the Portfolio Control tab to instantly filter your assets.

training.title: Training Field Intelligence
training.desc: Select any property and click Edit Details. Scroll to the AI Training Data section to add personalized local knowledge.

knowledge.title: Business Knowledge Base
knowledge.desc: Navigate to Identity & Branding. Complete your agency profile including Terms, Privacy Policy, and Service Areas.

mobile.title: Mobile Command Center
mobile.desc: Install EstateGuard to your home screen. On mobile, check the Pipeline Management tab to see prioritized leads.

support.title: Need further assistance?
support.subtitle: Our support team is available for Enterprise clients.
